definition: gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)

sentences.english: Urinalysis yielded bile salts and pigments.
In this paper, anti-inflammatory action of human cholochrome cholelith (HCC) were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 對人膽色素結石的抗炎作用進行了動物實驗研究。

sentences.english: The liver, it seemed, was not breaking up the hemoglobin to bile pigment.
sentences.chinese: 看來肝並沒有把血紅蛋白分解成膽色素。

sentences.english: Bacteria or bile pigment may serve as a nidus for crystal formation.
sentences.chinese: 細菌或膽色素可作爲結晶形成的一個核心。

sentences.english: Infection and obstruction of the biliary tract are causes of pigment stone formation.
sentences.chinese: 膽道梗阻和感染是膽色素結石形成的重要原因。
